Canva AI, on the other hand, is AI-powered design platform with Magic Design, background removal, and intelligent design suggestions.. Users choose it for AI, Design, Graphics.

verdict: Both Cursor and Canva AI are solid choices for generative ai. Your choice depends on your specific requirements: Cursor is better for AI, while Canva AI excels at AI. Consider trying both with their free tiers or trials to see which fits your workflow better.
